@calem1111

Well, it may seem to be "fucking retarded" once u see that the files are multiple. But, it isn't a problem when u know how to play them.

Just select all the files and drag them into VLC player. It will automatically start playing the files one after the other and u have don't even have to change the files.

So, stop complaining and enjoy the upload.

There is a slight error in all of the videos in which the audio and video is out of sync. This can be fixed by going into the audio settings of Media Player Classic and setting the value in Audio Time Shift (ms) to -500. Otherwise a fantastic upload. Keep up the good work. :)
